dublin_core.dcvalue: The driving forces toward adoption of TeleCare into the non acute care setting are more compelling than ever before The dramatic increase in our elderly population which provides an endless consumer base availability of functional and affordable technologies and a national mandate to control costs of health care are forcing even the most skeptical health care decisionmakers to accept TeleCare as a standard model of care Add to this the most severe nursing shortage to date and the formula is complete
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T12:19:58Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2000-09-18
Caring : National Association for Home Care magazine
Exploring the new frontier: home care gets wired.
